channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: No street lights on Thames Road, 7th December
item.description:
Thames Road. Street lights off since Wednesday evening/Thursday morning. Still off Thursday evening 9pm
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Thames Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous road erosion., 7th December
item.description:
Road outside Tump Cottage getting badly broken up an getting very dangerous, especially when filled with water. You can't see the hole.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flood at end of St James Pl, 7th December
item.description:
The end of St James Pl, where it meets Painswick Road is flooded to the point of encroaching onto the pavement. Appeared approximately 7cm to 10cm deep in places. Heavy rain at the time of viewing, with the flood appearing to gradually be worsening.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Saint James Place, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road signs on pavement remain, 7th December
item.description:
This area had some roadworks a week or so ago and this appears to have finished. Two large 'men at work' road signs remain on the pavement causing an obstruction and the pavements are filthy where it was dug up and re tarmac'd. This is outside Barnwood Construction and the old Manor House. Please could this be cleaned and the signs removed if the work is finished as I walk along here with my kids on the school run every day.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnwood Road, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: At least 3 years in existence of large potholes, worsening rapidly, 7th December
item.description:
Outside 35 & 37 in the road Numerous other potholes up & down the road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Courtiers Drive, Bishop's Cleeve

item.title: Highway drain flooded on New Road, 7th December
item.description:
The gulley at the bottom of the driveway to the house named Tanglewood is flooded and overflowing. The drain appears to be blocked causing the gulley to fill and overflow. The issue has been present for considerable time. The gulley was cleared a few months ago but continues to flood which suggests the drain pipe run may be blocked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): New Road, Southam, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Loose gravel on cyclepath, 7th December
item.description:

item.title: Enormous hole in road, 6th December
item.description:
B4063. Travelling from GCHQ, past bamfurlong lane traffic lights towards Dowty. Approx 50m past the traffic lights on the left hand side of the road is a big crater. Will need to have wheel inspected as almost certainly caused serious damage!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
